OptionPackage.DisplayName: SINAMICS Startdrive G130, G150, S120, S150, SINAMICS MV, S210
SINAMICS Startdrive G110M, G120, G120C, G120D, G120P

Comment.MultiLanguageText: Setpoints need to be chronologically increasing
rActual increases or decreases faster than the limit. False if rate is left as 0.
rActual does not reach rSetpoint within allowed time delay and deadband. False if deadband left at 0.
Maximum permitted change in rActual per second
Range around rSetpoint that is still considered within range
Allowable delay to allow rActual to reach rSetpoint after change

AttributeList.Text: Processes raw analog input and evaluates alarms. Note: All alarms are momentary, i.e. no ack necessary and they reset themselves when the condition becomes false.
Scale raw input based on calibration

LineComment.Text: Set the current value on startup to prevent a spurious alarm
Compare values at every given time interval to get rate of change
ignore alarm if max rate is left at default of 0
If no time schedule is defined, default to first setpoint in array
Check for setpoint from previous day
Iterate through and find current setpoint

AttributeList.Text: Determine current setpoint based on time of day

LineComment.Text: Set the current value on startup to prevent a spurious alarm
Evaluate alarm after settling time has elapsed
ignore alarm if deadband is left at default of 0
Save setpoint value for next comparison
